alert.note: Alert for Cumberland (Maine) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued December 18 at 4:03PM EST until December 19 at 10:50AM EST by NWS Gray/Portland
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Gray ME has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Maine... Presumpscot River At West Falmouth affecting Cumberland County. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL LATE TOMORROW MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Presumpscot River at West Falmouth. * WHEN...Until late tomorrow morning. * IMPACTS...At 15.0 feet, Minor flooding affects storage yards of industrial businesses on Warren Avenue in Westbrook. Property should be relocated to places which are 5 feet higher than nearby river banks to avoid being flooded or isolated. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 3:45 PM EST Monday the stage was 12.8 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage this evening to a crest of 15.4 feet just after midnight tonight. It will then fall below flood stage late tonight. - Flood stage is 14.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/gray.
